PrimarySkill.Description: Twin flame blades spin around you for FIRESAW_DUR seconds, dealing [u]FIRESAW_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage and applies stacks of [color=#fd9628]Burning[/color].
PrimarySkill.Summary: Unleash two spinning flame blades that deal [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage and apply [color=#fd9628]Burning[/color] stacks.

SecondarySkill.Description: Summon a fire fairy that automatically tracks enemies, dealing [u]FIREFAIRY_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire damage[/color]. The fairy prioritizes attacking enemies marked with [color=#fd9628]Sulphuric Sigil[/color].
SecondarySkill.Description2: If there are currently no enemies marked with [color=#fd9628]Sulphuric Sigil[/color], the fairy marks an enemy it attacks. [color=red]Player[/color]'s [color=#ffd703]Charged Attack[/color] can mark enemies. [color=#fd9628]Sulphuric Sigil[/color] is only active on the latest enemy target it is afflicted to.
SecondarySkill.Description3: Hitting enemies marked with [color=#fd9628]Sulphuric Sigil[/color] fills up [color=#F0E68C]Meter[/color]. When [color=#F0E68C]Meter[/color] is full, consumes all [color=#F0E68C]Meter[/color] value and automatically performs a [color=#ffd703]Joint Attack[/color], dealing [u]4xFIREFAIRY_JOINT_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage.
SecondarySkill.Description4: At the end of its duration, it detonates and deals [u]FIREFAIRY_EX_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage. Recast the skill to teleport the fairy to your location.
SecondarySkill.Summary: Summon a fire fairy that attacks enemies. Can perform special Joint Attacks, and be recast to teleport it to your location. Detonates at the end of its duration.

TertiarySkill.Description: Shoot a flaming orb that travels forward in a straight line, dealing [u]FIREBALL_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage. You can hold up to FIREBALL_CHARGES charges.
